question: Can the essence of consciousness exist without a physical body?

answers.claude-3-5-sonnet: Probably not - consciousness, as a dynamic progression of _something_ means, to me, physical embodiment (even if in the form of information, which is physical imo)
answers.gpt-4: Probably not - consciousness, as a dynamic progression of _something_ means, to me, physical embodiment (even if in the form of information, which is physical imo)
answers.llama-3.1-70b-versatile: With the data we leave behind yes.
